creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: I must admit I'm guessing here, but this certainly is not a bug report for Ant.

The APR project recommends CMake with trunk. Build files exist on the release branches, but these may be going away altogether in 2.0, and change too often to maintain on the development branches.

If this is in relation to a release package, insufficient info is provided in this report to diagnose.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
